scripts.publish: rm -rf .git && git init && git add . && git commit -m 'rebuilt' && git remote add origin https://github.com/krawaller/js-app-solutions.git && git push -f origin master && rm -rf .git
scripts.pubci: cd circleci && git init && git add . && git commit -m 'rebuilt' && git remote add origin https://github.com/krawaller/testcircleci.git && git push -f origin master
